    • buildDefaultRace

      public Arena buildDefaultRace(int maxRacers) throws ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchMethodException, SecurityException, InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException, IllegalArgumentException, InvocationTargetException
      Builds a default race with the specified maximum number of racers.
      Parameters:
      maxRacers - the maximum number of racers in the race
      Returns:
      the created Arena object downcasted to the specific arena type
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the specified arena type is not found
      NoSuchMethodException - if the constructor for the specified arena type is not found
      SecurityException - if a security violation occurs
      InstantiationException - if an error occurs while instantiating the Arena object
      IllegalAccessException - if there is illegal access to the constructor of the Arena object
      IllegalArgumentException - if an illegal argument is passed to the constructor of the Arena object
      InvocationTargetException - if an error occurs while invoking the constructor of the Arena object
